description: This table contains data in the Discrete Goals (IGO) master file that is no-add data.

columns.name: GOAL_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the goal record.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The user ID of the person who entered this goal.

columns.name: GOAL_TEMPLATE_ID
columns.description: Stores the goal template used to create this record

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient who is associated with this goal.

columns.name: CREATE_INST_DTTM
columns.description: The instant this goal was created.

columns.name: GOAL_USAGE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Context in which the goal is used.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Care Plan


Patient-Oriented


Pathway


Home Health/Hospice Care Plan

columns.name: REC_VAL_COMPLIAN_YN
columns.description:
Contains a category value denoting whether or not the most recent compliance value is compliant


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: MOST_RECENT_VALUE
columns.description: Contains the most recent compliance value for the goal

columns.name: RECENT_VALUE_I_DTTM
columns.description: The instant that the most recent compliance value was recorded

columns.name: REC_VALUE_CHEC_DTTM
columns.description: The instant that this goal was checked to determine its most recent compliance value

columns.name: AMB_GOAL_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Ambulatory goal type category (for example, Blood Pressure, Diet, etc.).


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Diet


Exercise


Weight


Blood Pressure


Result Component


Patient Stated


Contingency


General

columns.name: MYC_CREATE_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the ID of patient account record of the MyChart (Epic Patient Portal) user who created the goal.

columns.name: GOAL_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The current status of the goal.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Done


Deleted
